appDesc.description: Uncle George has left you his farm, but unfortunately it’s in pretty bad shape. Using business skills and the help of your neighbors, family and friends you can turn the overgrown barnyard into a beautiful and prosperous farm again. Plant the right crops, harvest and process them, care for your animals and make sure that your workers are happy – this is how your farm will grow successfully.
appDesc.message: Big Farm is a great farm simulation title. Enjoy the beautiful country life and manage your own virtual farm.
